pr_title: Addressing the missing default admin system message update. Removing outdated code.

timeline.message: Fix: Addressing the missing default admin system message update. Removing outdated code.

timeline.bodyText: Do we definitely want to do this for GETs?
timeline.author: gkillough

replies.bodyText: I think this is just defensive coding in case someone tries to sent a payload of data with the sysadmin user id.We want to validate the sysadmin user to not potentially change the sysadmin user.
replies.author: psantos1113

replies.bodyText: Github displays this in a weird way. This is in createUser not in getUsers. You need to expand the code to see that.
replies.author: jamesrichard91
